li.a: APPR and The 12 Indicators of the NYSUT Rubric
Parent Guide to NYS Next Generation Standards

div.style: font-size: small; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: georgia, serif;
div.span: The Superintendent's blog this week discusses what NY State schools have done, and continueto do, in preparation for the Coronavirus, congratulations to Staley PE teacher Diane Penella, kindergarten registration reminder, and an update on the RFA Travel Club Meeting. Have a great week!
